column4: Hello, is there a way to make my windows bar transparent, they do when it is the non selected window, but i want them to always be transparent. Thankyou
sudo apt-get install simple-ccsm to get a program to configure compiz
i have compiz advanced setting manager already
Then what are you looking for?
how to make my windows bar transparent i do not know how
That is actually part of the "emerald" project.  You have to install emerald: "sudo apt-get install emerald" and then you have to turn it on
i have emerald... but how do i configure it
There is also a emerald settings manager in the repos.  To turn it on "emerald --replace&" in a terminal
thankyou so now if i want to turn it of how do i do that
compiz --replace&
or possibly "metacity --replace&" but that might shut off compiz as well.
the first compiz-- replace did not work i still have the emerald thewme thing
metacity --replace&
now i dont have the minimize buttons or close buttons
metacity --replace
i closed the terminal and it worked... thanks
A restart will bring them back W.C.S.  The proper way to start emerald with compiz is to add "emerald" to the window decorator plugin.
In the ccsm
